name: Banality (bullshit)
description:
Block these purple people from reaching the green people, for at least 120 seconds. Use the purple walls and your police car. Atm there is no game over and the camera might get stuck if you move it into the ground. Also you can move the purple goal, which might lead to funny bugs.

Left mouse: Move camera, select object, move object, Select destination
Right mouse: Rotate camera, rotate selected object
Mouse wheel: zoom
